pages.title: PPE Powerup
pages.text: $(item)Rubber$() is the key to an all new, whole body protective suit. This prevents you from getting affected by $(thing)Chemical Pollution$(), and saves you from the pain of rain acidified by the $(thing)Mist$(). Furthermore, this suit is slim fitting enough to be applied as a lining on any other armour, simply by crafting it with the matching piece of $(item)Protective Suit$()!
You can also make a more protective $(item)Respirator$().
